title: uruga vENum manamE
sahitya:
uruga vENum manamE muruga nAmam Odi


anupallavi

  paramAnandam ura pAri tanil nI ini perugum bhaktiyODavan padam adanait-tudittu


caraNam    kAsu paNam tEDiDum Ashai mrnmEl kUDi kAsiniyidanil ODi kavalai mighundu vADi
pAsha valaiyil sikki mOha mayakkamurAdu vIsu pugazh vElanadu dAsanAgum AshaiyODu
